CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function unique_name_41 appears to be vulnerable to command injection. This is due to the use of the spawn function with user-supplied input (self.cmdarg and type) without proper sanitization or validation. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands through these inputs, leading to arbitrary command execution on the server.
